children.text: The waterproofing throughout the wet areas of this home have not been completed as required by the NCCâ€™s Building Code of Australia and AS 3740 Waterproofing of Domestic Wet Areas.

I note that the building permit reveals that your builder has applied for an alternative method of construction within these areas from the greater protection set out in AS 3740 and that the Building Surveyor has accepted and approved this. As a result, the present level of protection in your wet areas is deemed sufficient; however, should any issues arise in the future, the builder will remain responsible beyond the normal non-structural warranty period, as it has not been properly completed in accordance with Australian standard AS 3740.
